titles.title: This is the year of Jubilee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is the year of jubilee,
When the lame shall walk,
And the blind shall see,
And the Lord will set the captive free,
This is the year of jubilee

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Shalom, Shalom!
Shalom, Shalom!
Shalom, Shalom!
Jerusalem, Jerusalem.
